document_data.title: Uprising
document_data.story arc:
[[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]]
Terminal Ambitions Adventure: The Cold Dark
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Uprising''''', designed by [[Greg Marks]] and [[Jonathan Connor Self]], is an adventure in the [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]] storyline published for the [[Adventurers League]]. It is the third part of The Cold Dark series.

{{Quote|''The Thayans are fortifying buildings in the center of Xorvintroth. It's time to figure out why they're here.''{{Cite adventurers league/Uprising|1}}|}}
